name: Outro
commands: Senya is mad that Bones managed to escape, -1
Senya is happy that we managed to kill Bones, +1
Schuri is upset we were unable to stop the bandits, -1
Schuri is happy that we managed to keep the villages safe, +1
Rest of the bandits got lost once their leader's dead.|That's a big hit to their leadership structure.|...|Schuri...

A whole village is gone because of us.|We-...we should have played it safe and protected the villagers.|I...I know the reasoning but...I...|Let's just... get out of here.|I don't think I can stomach being here any longer.
...We can use the bandit fort to rest up.|We'll leave tommorow morning.
That's the last of them...|But how the hell could we let that lowlife get away!?|Do you know what type of opportunity we just let slip through our fingers?
We had no choice Senya, we had to protect the villagers here.

We need to think of the bigger picture sometimes!|I know it probably feels good that we managed to save these people,|but we can't....|sorry I didn't mean to yell like that.|Let's just...rest at the villages and leave tommorow morning.
Damn it!|That bastard got away!|We let him get away...and...
Forget that...We...|we failed to stop the bandits as well.
The whole party seems at a loss for words over their failure.|The group decided to rest up at the bandit fort and leave tommorow morning.
Rest of the bandits got lost once their leader's dead.|That's a big hit to their leadership structure.
I...can't believe we actually pulled that off!
It's all thanks to you {var:MC_name}, that was some quick thinking there.
Thanks but...was thanks to you two as well|We're a team, we can overcome anything if we work together.
No kidding.|Alright we can't let our guard down though.|That fight was a lot tougher without teacher by our side.|It's getting dark soon, let's rest up at the villages and leave in the morning.
